Class SplitOptions

Specifies options how the document is split into parts.

Constructor Detail

SplitOptions

public SplitOptions()
Property Getters/Setters Detail

getSplitCriteria/setSplitCriteria

public int getSplitCriteria() / public void setSplitCriteria(int value)
Specifies the criteria for splitting the document into parts. The value of the property is SplitCriteria integer constant.

Example:

Shows how to split document by pages.
String doc = getMyDir() + "Big document.docx";

SplitOptions options = new SplitOptions();
options.setSplitCriteria(SplitCriteria.PAGE);
Splitter.split(doc, getArtifactsDir() + "LowCode.SplitDocument.1.docx", options);
Splitter.split(doc, getArtifactsDir() + "LowCode.SplitDocument.2.docx", SaveFormat.DOCX, options);

getSplitStyle/setSplitStyle

public java.lang.String getSplitStyle() / public void setSplitStyle(java.lang.String value)
Specifies the paragraph style for splitting the document into parts when SplitCriteria.STYLE is used.
